page.title: 19More thoughts from grown-ups
page.content: Hooliganism on the terraces. This was another topic that everyone talked about. Most people were concerned about the general level of behaviour in the country . They were disturbed by football hooligans, muggings, especially of old people,drug abuse and attacks on children. Many people thought that sports stars were paid too much money and that made them over competitive. The tragedy in Belgium made everybody more annoyed about the few fans who spoil other people's enjoyment.Many people think it is just part of the trouble we see all over the world. We think that spectators are getting worse at all sports and that many of them go to see the worst side of the game such as McEnroe arguing with the umpire or rugby players fighting.
